Field Detail

ball

protected java.awt.Image ball

previousLocation

protected java.awt.geom.Point2D previousLocation

spaceColors

protected int[] spaceColors
The colors for each of the spaces. Since the spaces don't always alternate, need to assign individually.

spaceNumbers

protected int[] spaceNumbers
The values for the spaces on the roulette wheel. Based on orientation of the image of the wheel, #32 is at Space=1

Method Detail

getAngularVelocity

public double getAngularVelocity()
Gets the angular velocity of this element. Convention is positive values are clockwise.

Specified by:
getAngularVelocity in interface jago.element.Mobile
Returns:
Empty

getColor

public int getColor()
Gets the color of the space that the ball is in.

Returns:
a RouletteData color of RED_SPACE, BLACK_SPACE, or GREEN_SPACE.

getHeading

public double getHeading()
Gets the current heading. Doesn't really have any meaning with the roulette wheel.

Specified by:
getHeading in interface jago.element.Mobile
Returns:
The current rotational heading of the wheel.

getNumber

public int getNumber()
Based on the location of the ball, determines the number that the ball has landed on.

Returns:
The number of the space. If the space is the "00" space, the value returned will be 100.

getNumberString

public java.lang.String getNumberString()
Based on the location of the ball, determines the number that the ball has landed on.

Returns:
The number of the space, as a String.

spin

public void spin()
Start spinning the wheel. Starts the ball at a random location and with a random velocity (about 1-2 deg/ms), and spins the wheel at random initial velocity (tries to spin for 7-8 sec).

updatePosition

public void updatePosition()
Updates the position of the wheel and ball.

Specified by:
updatePosition in interface jago.element.Mobile

runTaskStep

protected void runTaskStep()
Updates the position of the roulette wheel and ball, based on a single step of execution of the simulation.
